summary.span: 充当基类，该基类定义 命名空间中的所有控件常见的方法、属性和事件。

span.span: Serves as the base class that defines the methods, properties and events common to all controls in the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供所有 Web 服务器控件通用的属性、方法和事件。The class provides the properties, methods, and events that are common to all Web server controls. 可以通过设置此类中定义的属性来控制 Web 服务器控件的外观和行为。You can control the appearance and behavior of a Web server control by setting properties defined in this class. 例如，控件的背景色和字体颜色分别通过使用 和属性来控制 。For example, the background color and font color of a control are controlled by using the and properties, respectively. 对于可以显示边框的控件，可以通过设置 、和属性来控制边框宽度、边框样式和边框颜色 。On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the , , and properties. 可以使用和属性指定 Web 服务器控件的大小 。The size of a Web server control can be specified by using the and properties. 可以通过设置某些属性来指定控件的行为。The behavior of the control can be specified by setting certain properties. 可以通过设置属性来启用和禁用控件 。You can enable and disable a control by setting the property. 控件在 tab 键顺序中的位置是通过设置属性来控制的 。The place of the control in the tab order is controlled by setting the property. 可以通过设置属性来指定控件的工具提示 。You can specify a ToolTip for the control by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有控件都支持此类中定义的每个属性。Not all controls support every property defined in this class. 有关是否支持属性的特定信息，请参阅特定控件的文档。For specific information about whether a property is supported, see the documentation for the specific control. > [!NOTE] > 此类中的某些属性呈现方式不同，具体取决于浏览器。Some properties in this class render differently, depending on the browser. 有些属性根本不会呈现，而另一些则不会产生任何影响。Some properties do not render at all, while others render, but have no effect. 对象的属性 决定了 Web 服务器控件的呈现方式。The property of the object determines the way in which a Web server control renders. 对于支持 HTML 4.0 的浏览器，该 属性将包含一个常规 对象，并且大多数属性都将使用 HTML 4.0 样式属性呈现。For browsers that support HTML 4.0, the property will contain a regular object, and most properties will be rendered using HTML 4.0 style attributes. 未知的浏览器不支持 HTML 4.0 将使用该 对象。Browsers that are not known to support HTML 4.0 will use the object. 这会自动将样式属性映射到任何相关的 HTML 3.2 标记属性。This will automatically map the style attributes to any relevant HTML 3.2 tag attributes. 在某些情况下（例如，在 属性中），样式属性将转换为其他标记，如 `` 标记。In some cases, such as with the property, the style attributes will be converted into additional tags, such as `` tags. 在某些情况下，将不会执行任何映射。In some cases, there will be no mapping performed. 有关如何在不同浏览器中呈现属性的特定信息，请参阅特定属性的文档。For specific information about how a property is rendered in different browsers, see the documentation for the specific property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WebControlAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebControlAddAttributesToRender/CS/addattrib.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebControlAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebControlAddAttributesToRender/VB/addattrib.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置使您得以快速导航到 Web 服务器控件的访问键。

span.span: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the Web server control.

value.span: 用于快速定位到 Web 服务器控件的访问键。

span.span: The access key for quick navigation to the Web server control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的键盘快捷方式。Use the property to specify the keyboard shortcut for the Web server control. 这使你可以通过按 ALT 键和键盘上指定字符的键来快速导航到控件。This allows you to navigate quickly to the control by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard. 例如，将控件的访问键设置为字符串 `"D"` 表示用户可以通过按 ALT + D 导航到控件。For example, setting the access key of a control to the string `"D"` indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D. 对于属性，只允许一个字符串 。Only a single character string is allowed for the property. 如果尝试将此属性设置为既不是 `null` 、，也不是单字符字符串的值，则 会引发异常。If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, , nor a single character string, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 只有 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置和使用控件的 属性 。The following example illustrates how to set and use the property of a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.AccessKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.AccessKey Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.AccessKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.AccessKey Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在客户端上呈现 Web 服务器控件的特性和样式，通常需要调用 和 方法将每个特性和样式分别插入到 输出流中。To render attributes and styles for a Web Server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要简化此过程，此方法会将所有对和方法的调用封装到 与 Web 服务器控件关联的每个特性和样式。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control. 所有属性和样式都 在单个方法调用中插入到输出流中。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call. 此方法通常由派生类中的控件开发人员重写，以将相应的特性和样式插入到 类的输出流中。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for the class. > [!NOTE] > 方法不能用于插入客户端脚本。The method cannot be used to insert client script. 若要使用客户端脚本，请参阅 类。To use client script, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建从类派生的类 。The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the class. 重写方法的基实现以添加适用于输出流中的派生类的特性 。The base implementation of the method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the output stream. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含在 Web 服务器控件的开始标记中声明的所有属性的集合。The collection contains a collection of all attributes declared in the opening tag of a Web server control. 这使您能够以编程方式控制与 Web 服务器控件关联的属性。This allows you to programmatically control the attributes associated with a Web server control. 可以向集合添加特性，也可以从集合中移除特性。You can add attributes to the collection or remove attributes from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 此属性在控件的开始标记中呈现集合中的所有属性，而不考虑浏览器设置。This property is rendered with all attributes in the collection in the control's opening tag, regardless of the browser settings. 并非所有浏览器都支持呈现的每个属性。Not all browsers support every attribute that is rendered. 浏览器通常会忽略不支持的属性。The unsupported attributes are usually ignored by the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用集合向实例添加客户端脚本 。You cannot add client-side script to a instance using the collection. 若要添加客户端脚本，请使用 控件上的属性 。To add client-side script, use the property on the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了在 控件失去焦点时，如何使用的属性来运行 JavaScript 命令 。The following example illustrates how the property of a can be used to run a JavaScript command when the control loses focus. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的背景色。Use the property to specify the background color of the Web server control. 使用对象设置此属性 。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将仅为某些控件呈现。This property will render for only certain controls. 例如，、、、 和 将呈现此属性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 它也适用于 ， 并且 如果其 `RepeatLayout` 属性为， `RepeatLayout.Table` `RepeatLayout.Flow` 则为。It will also work for , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 通常，仅呈现为标记的控件 `` 可以在 html 3.2 中显示背景色，而在 html 4.0 中几乎可以使用任何控件。In general, only controls that render as a `
` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.对于呈现为 `` 标记 (包括 、所有验证控件以及将其属性设置为) 的列表控件的控件， `RepeatLayout` `RepeatLayout.Flow` 此属性将在 microsoft internet explorer 版本5和更高版本中运行，但不能在 microsoft internet explorer 版本4中使用。For controls that render as a `` tag (including , all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later, but not in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 继承自基类的控件的属性 。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 控件的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the Web control.

value.span: 表示控件的边框颜色的 。

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的边框颜色。Use the property to specify the border color of the Web Server control. 使用对象设置此属性 。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 属性将仅为某些控件呈现。The property will render only for certain controls. 例如，、、 、 和 控件将呈现此属性。For example, the , , , , and controls will render this property. 如果将、 和控件的 `RepeatLayout` 属性设置为 `RepeatLayout.Table` ， `RepeatLayout.Flow` 则它也适用于、和控件。It will also work for the , , and controls, if their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 但是，它将呈现为 `bordercolor` 属性，该属性不是 HTML 3.2 标准的一部分。However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which is not part of the HTML 3.2 standard. 此 `bordercolor` 属性适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本3.0 或更高版本，但不适用于大多数其他浏览器。The `bordercolor` attribute works for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.0 or later, but not most other browsers. 如果 未设置该属性，则浏览器将使用其默认边框颜色。When the property is not set, the browser will use its default border color. 请参阅浏览器来确定其默认配色方案。Refer to your browser to determine its default color scheme. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 继承自基类的控件的属性 。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。Use the property to specify the border style for the Web server control. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性 。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |边框样式Border Style|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置边框样式。The border style is not set.| |`None`|无边框No border| |`Dotted`|虚线边框。A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|点划线边框。A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|实线边框。A solid line border.| |`Double`|实线双线边框。A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|用于凹陷边框外观的凹槽状边框。A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|用于凸起边框外观的突起边框。A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|用于凹陷控件外观的内嵌边框。An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|用于凸起控件外观的外嵌边框。An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > 对于任何 Web 服务器控件，此属性将不会在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4 之前的浏览器中呈现。This property will not render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer 4 for any Web server control. HTML 3.2 中没有等效项。There is no equivalent to it in HTML 3.2. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 继承自基类的控件的属性 。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可指定控件的边框宽度。Use the property to specify a border width for a control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不适用于所有 Web 服务器控件。This property does not work with all Web server controls. 它仅适用于显示为表的控件，例如 和 。It applies only to controls that display as a table, such as and . 此属性是使用对象设置的 。This property is set with a object. 如果 的属性 包含负数，则会引发异常。If the property of the contains a negative number, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本5的浏览器，边框宽度只能用像素表示。The border width can be expressed only in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 、、、 和 属性从指定的 web 服务器控件复制到从中调用此方法的 web 服务器控件。The method copies the , , , , and properties from the specified Web server control to the Web server control that this method is called from. 这通常用于 Web 服务器控件在呈现和使用控件时动态创建新控件的工作情况。This is commonly used in cases where a Web server control works by dynamically creating new controls while it is rendering and using the controls. 此方法在这种情况下很有用，因为它复制不是由对象封装的 Web 服务器控件的所有属性 ，因此它们可以放置在要呈现的标记的最外面的控件上。This method is useful in this situation because it copies all properties of Web server controls not encapsulated by the object so they can be placed on the outermost control of a tag that is being rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定要在 Web 服务器控件的客户端上呈现的 CSS 类。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web Server control. 此属性将在所有控件的浏览器中呈现。This property will render on browsers for all controls. 它将始终呈现为类属性，而不考虑浏览器。It will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). 例如，假设您具有以下 Web 服务器控件声明：For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 在以前的 Web 服务器控件声明的客户端上呈现以下 HTML：The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 如果使用级联样式表 (CSS) 自定义控件的外观，请使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不能同时使用两者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of a control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 同时使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. > [!NOTE] > 在不支持 CSS 的浏览器中，设置 属性将不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来更改控件的样式 。The following example illustrates how to use the property to change the style of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). value.span: 默认值为“aspNetDisabled”。

span.span: The default value is "aspNetDisabled".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于更改为各个 Web 控件的属性呈现的名称 。This property can be used to change the name that is rendered for the property of individual Web controls. 默认情况下，此属性将返回 "aspNetDisabled"。By default, this property returns "aspNetDisabled". 当 在派生类中被重写以返回时 `false` ，属性的值 将呈现为 `class` 控件的 HTML 元素的特性的值。When is overridden in a derived class to return `false`, the value of the property is rendered as the value of the `class` attribute of the HTML element for the control. 在这种情况下，如果属性中存在值 ，则这两个 CSS 类将应用于呈现的 HTML 元素。In that case, if there is a value in the property, both CSS classes will be applied to the rendered HTML element. 属性 `class` 将包含属性的值 ，后跟属性的值 （用空格分隔）。The `class` attribute will consist of the value of the property followed by the value of the property, separated by a space. 此属性是静态的，这意味着您只能为类设置此属性 。This property is static, which means that you can set it only for the class. 设置为的任何值用于 Web 应用程序中的所有控件。Whatever value you set it to is used for all controls in a Web application. 不能为各个控件指定不同的值。You cannot specify different values for individual controls. 如果要使用不同于默认值 "aspNetDisabled" 的类名称，则通常会在 global.asax 文件的方法中放置代码来执行此操作 `Application_Start` ，如以下示例中所示：If you want to use a class name different from the default value of "aspNetDisabled", you typically put the code to do that in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file, as shown in the following example: ```vb Private Sub Application_Start( ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName" End Sub ``` ```csharp void Application_Start(object sender, EventArgs e) { WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName"; } ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示 当 属性为 `false` 、属性 具有其默认值并且 属性为空时，已禁用控件的呈现的 HTML。The following example shows rendered HTML for a disabled control when the property is `false`, when the property has its default value, and when the property is empty. `Test` 下面的示例显示了在相同条件下呈现的 HTML，但 属性的值为 "SampleStyle"`:`The following example shows rendered HTML under the same conditions except that the property has the value "SampleStyle"`:` `Test` 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用 Web 服务器控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web server control is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if control is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将控件的属性设置为时 `false` ，控件通常显示为灰色。When the property of a control is set to `false`, the control typically appears dimmed. 如果该控件是一个输入元素，则浏览器将阻止用户在其中单击或键入。If the control is an input element, the browser prevents the user from clicking or typing in it. 通过设置为服务器控件呈现的 HTML 元素的 `disabled` 特性或其 CSS 特性来将其标记为禁用 `class` 。HTML elements that are rendered for a server control are marked as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . 此属性向下传播控件层次结构。This property propagates down the control hierarchy. 如果禁用容器控件，则也会禁用该容器中的子控件。If you disable a container control, the child controls within that container are also disabled. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 在自定义复合控件中，此继承行为不适用于尚未创建其子控件的控件。In a custom composite control, this inheritance behavior does not apply to controls that have not yet created their child controls. 创建子控件时，必须设置其启用状态，或重写 属性以调用 方法。You must either set the enabled state of the child controls when they are created, or override the property to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 禁用控件只会阻止用户通过浏览器 UI 与控件进行交互。Disabling a control only prevents interaction with the control by the user through the browser UI. 用户可以创建一个请求，该请求将提交由页面处理的回发，即使已禁用页面上的控件。It is possible for a user to craft a request that submits a postback that is processed by the page even if controls on the page are disabled. 在处理回发请求之前，请检查以确保已启用并显示该控件。Before you process a postback request, check to make sure that the control is enabled and visible. 并非所有控件都支持此属性。Not all controls support this property. 有关详细信息，请参阅各个控件。See the individual controls for details. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例 通过以编程方式设置控件的属性，说明如何启用和禁用从基类继承的控件 。The following example illustrates how to enable and disable a control, inherited from the base class, by setting its property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.Enabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.Enabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为指定控件启用主题。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control. 当 属性为时 `true` ，将在应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply. 如果主题目录中不存在特定控件的外观，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied. 当 属性为时 `false` ，不会搜索主题目录，也 不会使用属性的内容。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property is not used. 控件可以重写 其父控件或包含页设置的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control or the containing page. 例如，如果父控件的 属性设置为 `false` ，则可以通过 `true` 在各个子控件上将属性设置为，来有选择地将主题应用到父控件中包含的子控件。For example, if a parent control has the property set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls that are contained within the parent by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls. 可以在页、容器或控件级别启用主题。Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 如果在页面或容器级别禁用了主题，则会为该页或容器包含的所有控件禁用主题。When theming is disabled at the page or container level, themes are disabled for all controls that are contained by the page or container.

Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性从控件中收集字体信息 。The following example illustrates how to use the property to gather font information from a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的高度。Use the property to specify the height of the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4的浏览器中的所有控件，此属性不会呈现。This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. 不在早期浏览器中呈现此属性的控件包括 、、 和任何验证控件。Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include , , , and any validation controls. 当属性设置为时，和不在早期浏览器中呈现此属性 `RepeatLayout` `RepeatLayout.Flow` 。The , and also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 而且， `Pixel` `Percentage` 在早期的浏览器中仅支持和的单位类型。Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers. 由于此属性是非标准 HTML，显示为表的 Web 服务器控件（例如 和 ）在早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4的浏览器中不支持此属性。Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as and , do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. > [!NOTE] > 若要将 属性设置为默认值以外的单位类型 `Pixel` ，必须创建特定于所需单位类型的新单位类型。To set the property to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want. 例如，若要将控件的 属性设置为百分比值100，则可以执行以下操作：For example, to set a control's property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.Width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > 有关可用于属性的单位类型的详细信息 ，请参阅 类。For more information on the unit types available for the property, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置 从基类继承的控件的属性 。The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the property of the control, inherited from the base class. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用控件。

value.span: 如果启用 对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是只读属性。This is a read-only property. 如果要禁用控件，请将其 属性设置为 `false` 。If you want to disable a control, you set its property to `false`. 如果控件不包含在另一个控件中，则该属性的值 始终与属性的值相同 。If a control is not contained by another control, the value of the property is always the same as the value of the property. 如果控件是另一个控件的子控件并且满足以下所有条件，则该属性的值与属性不同：The property has a value that is different from the property if a control is a child of another control and if all the following circumstances are true: - 父控件的属性值或 属性值为 `false` 。The value of the property or the property of the parent control is `false`. - 子控件的属性设置为 `true` 。The property of the child control is set to `true`. 在这种情况下，子控件继承父控件的禁用状态。In this situation, the child control inherits the disabled state of the parent control. 子控件的属性将返回 `false` 以指示控件已禁用，即使子控件未通过将其属性设置为而显式禁用 `false` 。The property of the child control returns `false` to indicate that the control is disabled even though the child control was not explicitly disabled by setting its property to `false`. 父控件本身可能会将其 属性设置为， `true` 但可能会从其父控件继承禁用状态，依此类推。The parent control itself might have its property set to `true` but might inherit the disabled state from its parent, and so on. 当 ASP.NET 呈现服务器控件的 HTML 元素时，它通过设置元素的 `disabled` 特性或其 CSS 特性来将元素标记为禁用 `class` 。When ASP.NET renders HTML elements for a server control, it marks the elements as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的累计值。View state is the cumulative values of the properties for a server control. 这些值自动置于 服务器控件的属性中，该属性是类的实例 。These values are placed automatically in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 然后，在 服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段后，将属性值保存到字符串对象。The property value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the life cycle for the server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页生命周期概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 元素中的变量返回给客户端 `input` 。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML `input` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写 方法并修改服务器控件的属性来提高效率 。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的可用外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 属性指定要应用于控件的外观。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 外观特定于特定控件;不能在不同类型的控件之间共享外观设置。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin setting between controls of different types. 如果未设置 属性，控件将使用默认外观（如果已定义）。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果为控件定义了没有 ID 的外观 ，则该外观适用于 未按 ID 显式引用外观且未设置为禁用主题的所有控件。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming. 如果为控件定义了具有 ID 的外观 ，则该外观仅适用于 其 设置为该 id 的控件。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to only controls whose is set to that ID. 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定的外观 ，则 在运行时将引发异常。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified , an exception is thrown at runtime.

exception.span: 主题中不存在 属性中指定的外观。

span.span: The skin specified in the property does not exist in the theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合来管理在 Web 服务器控件的外部标记中呈现的样式特性。Use the collection to manage the style attributes rendered in the outer tag of the Web server control. 此属性将在所有控件的所有浏览器中呈现。This property will render on all browsers for all controls. > [!NOTE] > 不支持样式特性的浏览器将忽略呈现的 HTML。Browsers that do not support style attributes will ignore the rendered HTML. 通过强类型样式属性设置的任何样式值 (例如， `BackColor="Red"`) 将自动覆盖此集合中的相应值。Any style values set through the strongly typed style properties (for example, `BackColor="Red"`) will automatically override a corresponding value in this collection. 此集合中设置的值不会自动反映在强类型样式属性中。Values set in this collection are not automatically reflected by the strongly typed style properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来隐藏或显示 页上的控件。The following example illustrates how to use the property to hide or display a control on a page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 总是为 。

span.span: Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中，此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。In derived classes, this property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. ## 禁用 ASP.NET Web 控件Disabling ASP.NET Web Controls 当 ASP.NET 控件的属性设置为 `false` (即，当控件被禁用时) ，目的是 ASP.NET 应呈现页面中的控件，但在禁用状态下显示该控件 (通常为灰显) 。When the property of an ASP.NET control is set to `false` (that is, when the control is disabled), the intent is that ASP.NET should render the control in the page, but display it in a disabled state (typically dimmed). 如果禁用父控件，则该控件的子控件也会显示为禁用。If a parent control is disabled, children of that control are also displayed as disabled. 在这种情况下，即使子控件的 `false` 属性可能设置为，子控件的属性也会设置为 `true` 。In that case, the child control's property is set to `false`, even though its property might be set to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 3.5 及更早版本中，当控件的 属性为时，ASP.NET 会将 `false` `disabled` 它为控件呈现的 HTML 元素中的属性设置为 "disabled"。In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, when a control's property is `false`, ASP.NET sets the `disabled` attribute to "disabled" in the HTML element that it renders for the control. 但是，HTML 4.01 标准仅允许对 `disabled` 用于用户输入的某些元素使用特性。However, the HTML 4.01 standard allows the `disabled` attribute only on certain elements that are used for user input. 例如， `disabled` 属性允许用于 `input` 元素，但不允许用于 `span` 元素。For example, the `disabled` attribute is allowed for `input` elements, but not for `span` elements. 大多数浏览器支持具有属性的仅显示元素的默认禁用外观 `disabled` 。Most browsers support a default disabled appearance for display-only elements that have `disabled` attributes. 但是，为了符合 HTML 标准，默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 忽略了无效的属性。However, in order to comply with HTML standards, by default ASP.NET 4 omits invalid attributes. ## 如何使用 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性How the SupportsDisabledAttribute Property is Used 如果 属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If the property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现特性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when the control is disabled. 如果满足以下所有条件，派生类将重写此属性以返回 `false` ：Derived classes override this property to return `false` if all the following conditions are true: - 控件呈现的 HTML 元素不支持 `disabled` 特性。The control renders an HTML element that does not support the `disabled` attribute. - 属性指示 ASP.NET 的版本号低于4.0。The property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0. 属性不一定指示为控件呈现的 HTML 元素是否支持 (允许) `disabled` 特性。The property does not necessarily indicate whether the HTML element that is rendered for a control supports (allows) the `disabled` attribute. 如果控件的 属性指示 ASP.NET 的版本号低于4.0，则 `true` 即使呈现的 HTML 不支持特性，控件的属性的值也可能会返回 `disabled` 。If a control's property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0, the value of the control's property might return `true` even if the rendered HTML does not support the `disabled` attribute. ## 禁用控件的向后兼容性Backward Compatibility for Disabled Controls 使用 Visual Studio 将 Web 项目从早期版本升级到 ASP.NET 4 时，Visual Studio 会自动 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 在 Web.config 文件中设置属性， () 将属性设置为更早的版本号。When you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file (which sets the property) to the earlier version number. 由于属性在 `true` 属性低于4.0 时始终返回，因此，这会导致 Web 控件呈现已禁用控件在早期版本中的 HTML。Because the property always returns `true` when the property is lower than 4.0, this causes Web controls to render HTML for disabled controls as they did in the earlier version. 如果希望升级的网站使用 ASP.NET 4 中引入的算法呈现 HTML，则可以更改或删除该 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 属性。If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## 使用 CSS 设置禁用的外观Setting a Disabled Appearance By Using CSS 如果 控件的属性为， `false` 并且该控件处于禁用状态，则 ASP.NET 会将 `class` 呈现的 HTML 元素的特性设置为属性的值 。If the property of a control is `false` and the control is disabled, ASP.NET sets the `class` attribute of the rendered HTML element to the value of the property. 属性的默认值 为 "aspNetDisabled"。The default value of the property is "aspNetDisabled". 若要为禁用的控件提供禁用的外观，必须为由属性的值表示的类定义 CSS 规则 。To provide a disabled appearance for disabled controls, you must define a CSS rule for the class that is represented by the value of the property. 如果为控件呈现的 HTML 元素的 `class` 属性中有值，则它在其属性中可能具有多个值 。The HTML element that is rendered for a control might have more than one value in its `class` attribute if there is a value in its property. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了已禁用控件的标记 ：The following example shows markup for a disabled control: `` 在 ASP.NET 3.5 及更早版本中，此标记呈现以下 HTML：In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, this markup renders the following HTML: `Test` 在 ASP.NET 4 中，如果属性的值 为4.0 或更大，并且 属性设置为其默认值，则相同的标记将呈现以下 HTML：In ASP.NET 4, if the value of the property is 4.0 or greater, and if the property is set to its default value, the same markup renders the following HTML: `Test`

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定 Web 窗体页上的 web 服务器控件的选项卡索引。Use the property to specify or determine the tab index of a Web server control on the Web Forms page. 按键时 `Tab` ，Web 服务器控件接收焦点的顺序取决于 每个控件的属性。When you press the `Tab` key, the order in which the Web server controls receive focus is determined by the property of each control. 最初加载页面时，按下键时获得焦点的第一项 `Tab` 是地址栏。When a page is initially loaded, the first item that receives focus when the `Tab` key is pressed is the address bar. 接下来，Web 窗体页上的控件将根据每个控件的属性的值以升序排列， 从最小的非零值开始。Next, the controls on the Web Forms page are tabbed to in ascending order, based on the value of the property of each control, starting with the smallest positive, nonzero value. 如果多个控件共享同一个选项卡索引，则这些控件将按其在 Web 窗体页上的声明顺序接收焦点。If multiple controls share the same tab index, the controls will receive focus in the order they are declared on the Web Forms page. 最后，选项卡索引为零的控件按其声明顺序排列。Finally, controls that have a tab index of zero are tabbed to in the order they are declared. > [!NOTE] > 只有具有非零选项卡索引的控件将呈现 `tabindex` 属性。Only controls with a nonzero tab index will render the `tabindex` attribute. 可以通过将属性设置为负值来从 tab 键顺序中删除 Web 服务器控件 。You can remove a Web Server control from the tab order by setting the property to a negative value. > [!NOTE] > 只有 Internet Explorer 4 及更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4 and later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 的属性 来设置页上控件的 tab 键顺序。The following example illustrates how to use the property of the to set the tab order of controls on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.TabIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.TabIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.TabIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.TabIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定当鼠标指针悬停在 Web 服务器控件上时显示的自定义文本。Use the property to specify the custom text that is displayed when the mouse pointer hovers over the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将为所有浏览器呈现。This property is rendered for all browsers. 但是，只有 Microsoft Internet Explorer 会将此属性显示为工具提示。However, only Microsoft Internet Explorer will display this property as a ToolTip. 所有其他浏览器将忽略此属性。All other browsers will ignore this property. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在 继承自基类的控件上设置属性 。The following example illustrates how to set the property on the control, which is inherited from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 使控件跟踪其视图状态的更改，以便将这些更改存储在对象的 属性中。

span.span: Causes the control to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 标记开始跟踪并保存对控件的视图状态所做的更改的起始点。The marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the view state for the control. 初始化服务器控件时，ASP.NET 会自动调用方法。The method is called automatically by ASP.NET when a server control is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的宽度。Use the property to specify the width of the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4的浏览器中的所有控件，此属性不会呈现。This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. 不在早期浏览器中呈现此属性的控件包括 、、 和任何验证控件。Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include , , , and any validation controls. 当属性设置为时，和不在早期浏览器中呈现此属性 `RepeatLayout` `RepeatLayout.Flow` 。The , and also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 而且， `Pixel` `Percentage` 在早期的浏览器中仅支持和的单位类型。Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers. 由于此属性是非标准 HTML，显示为表的 Web 服务器控件（例如 和 ）在早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4的浏览器中不支持此属性。Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as and , do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. > [!NOTE] > 若要以 声明方式将属性设置为默认值以外的单位类型 `Pixel` ，您必须创建一个特定于所需单位类型的新单位类型。To set the property declaratively to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want. 例如，若要将控件的 属性设置为百分比值100，则可以执行以下操作：For example, to set a control's property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > 有关可用于属性的单位类型的详细信息 ，请参阅 类。For more information on the unit types available for the property, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置 从基类继承的控件的属性 。The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the property of the control, inherited from the base class.
